definition: a methodical examination or review of a condition or situation, to attend academic courses without getting credit
details:
noun
- a methodical examination or review of a condition or situation
= example: a methodical examination or review of a condition or situation
- an inspection of the accounting procedures and records by a trained accountant or CPA
= synonyms: audited account
verb
- to attend academic courses without getting credit
= example: to attend academic courses without getting credit
- to examine carefully for accuracy with the intent of verification
= example: to examine carefully for accuracy with the intent of verification
= synonyms: scrutinize, scrutinise, inspect
